naslov: Luksuzna vila sa bazenom i spektakularnim pogledom na more - Podstrana (prodaja)
opis: Uronjena u idiličnu prirodu, ova veličanstvena moderna vila nudi nezaboravan doživljaj Mediterana na mirnoj lokaciji blizu mora u Donjoj Podstrani. Prostire se na tri etaže 360m2,  južne orijentacije sa prekrasnim otvorenim pogledom na more i garantira nezaboravne zalaske sunca. Ispred vile je velika terasa za večernje druženje uz mediteransku hranu i vrhunska vina, a preko dana je sunčalište sa bazenom i predivan vrt za opuštajuće trenutke na osvježavajućem morskom zraku. Spavaći dio je odvojen i nalazi se na katu što daje neometan boravak.U garaži ima dovoljno mjesta za zaštitu i sigurnost više automobila, a iza objekta je dovoljno parking mjesta za goste. Parcela je 1100m2 i ima asfaltirani pristupni put. Detaljnije o objektu: Korišteni su kvalitetni materijali za obloge i sanitarije visoke klase. Ekskluzivno namješteno s naglaskom na udobnost i stil. Vila je izvana izolirana termo-fasadom uključujući i podove, što daje odličnu energetsku učinkovitost. Solarni paneli daju dodatni izvor električne energije od čak 12Kwh koji su spojeni na mrežu distributera električne energije HEP, a postoji i sustav za prikupljanje kišnice za dobivanje tehničke vode, pa je dodatna ušteda na vodi iz vodovoda. Podrum: garaža 100m2 sa rolo vratima i tehnička soba 20m2. Unutarnjim stepenicama se može ući u vilu. Prizemlje: ima zasebni ulaz u stambeni dio ukupne površine 148m2, a sastoji se od prostranog dnevnog  boravka spojenog sa blagovaonom i kuhinjom(open-space), spavaće sobe sa kupatilom+wc te ostave. Na južnom dijelu je izlaz na terasu, zelenu površinu, dječje igralište, sunčalište i bazen 52m2. Prvi kat: površine 147m2, sastoji se od predsoblja, zasebne spavaće sobe sa privatnom kupaonicom, walk-in garderobom i terasom južne orijentacije s pogledom na more. Još tri spavaće sobe, spremište, kupaona sa wc-om i balkonom.(VIDI TLOCRT) Lokacija je u mirnom dijelu mjesta, pa novi vlasnik ima privatnost tokom boravka. Do prekrasne plaže je svega 5min hoda, a u blizini su restorani, kafići i supermarket. Grad Split sa svojim znamenitostima je svega 12km, a aerodrom na 30km. Ova vila nije samo dom – to je životni stil. Idealan izbor za one koji traže luksuz, privatnost i blizinu prirodnih ljepota. Kontaktirajte nas za razgledavanje i doživite sami ovu prekrasnu vilu! Razgled nekretnine moguć je isključivo uz potpisani Ugovor o posredovanju a što je u skladu sa Zakonom o zaštiti podataka i Zakonu o posredovanju u prometu nekretnina. Agencijska provizija je 3% Kontakt:  091/561-5115 ŽELJANA Luxury villa with pool and spectacular sea view - Podstrana Immersed in idyllic nature, this magnificent modern villa offers an unforgettable Mediterranean experience in a quiet location near the sea in Donja Podstrana. It extends over three floors of 360m2, south-facing with a beautiful open sea view and guarantees unforgettable sunsets. In front of the villa is a large terrace for evening socializing with Mediterranean food and top-quality wines, and during the day there is a sundeck with a pool and a beautiful garden for relaxing moments in the refreshing sea air. The sleeping area is separate and located on the first floor, which provides an undisturbed stay. There is enough space in the garage for the protection and security of several cars, and there is enough parking space for guests behind the building. The plot is 1100m2 and has an asphalted access road. More details about the property: High-quality materials were used for cladding and high-class sanitary ware. Exclusively furnished with an emphasis on comfort and style. The villa is insulated from the outside with a thermal facade including the floors, which provides excellent energy efficiency. Solar panels provide an additional source of electricity of as much as 12 kWh, which are connected to the HEP electricity distribution network, and there is also a system for collecting rainwater to obtain technical water, so there is additional savings on water from the water supply. Basement: 100m2 garage with roller doors and 20m2 technical room. The villa can be entered via internal stairs. Ground floor: has a separate entrance to the residential area with a total area of 148m2, and consists of a spacious living room connected to the dining room and kitchen (open-space), a bedroom with bathroom + toilet and a storage room. On the southern part there is an exit to the terrace, green area, children's playground, sunbathing area and 52m2 swimming pool. First floor: 147m2, consists of an entrance hall, separate bedroom with private bathroom, walk-in wardrobe and a south-facing terrace with a sea view. Three more bedrooms, storage room, bathroom with toilet and balcony. (SEE FLOOR PLAN) The location is in a quiet part of town, so the new owner has privacy during his stay. The beautiful beach is only a 5-minute walk away, and there are restaurants, cafes and a supermarket nearby. The city of Split with its sights is only 12km away, and the airport is 30km away. This villa is not just a home - it is a lifestyle. An ideal choice for those looking for luxury, privacy and proximity to natural beauty. Contact us for a tour and experience this beautiful villa for yourself! Viewing the property is only possible with a signed Brokerage Agreement, which is in accordance with the Data Protection Act and the Real Estate Brokerage Act.
